        public boolean fillCell(int x,
                        int y)
        Check possible selecte move, check for fill to others and fill into selected cells current player's character. Updates scores and swicth current player.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean true if successfully filled, false if move is not possible
